TITLE: Continuous update literature review on diet and cancer

TEXT: The peer-reviewed protocol will represent the agreed plan for the Continuous Update on breast cancer survivors. Should departure from the agreed plan be considered necessary at a later stage, this must be agreed by the WCRF/AICR Secretariat and the reasons documented.
